content: just wanted to let you know that we finally got access to more powerful builders and we're testing them
it will take a while to start gating on them, and we'll announce more details soon on internals/inside rust as they're not on azure pipelines
but we got a PR builder from 1hr 56min to 42min
and there is still a lot of room to reduce the build time
Nice. Is this some specific Azure VM type not normally available on Azure Pipelines?
